original_text: But the army officer did not believe what Paul said. Instead, he decided to do what the owner of the ship and the captain said.
korean_text: 백부장이 선장과 선주의 말을 바울의 말보다 더 믿더라

sentences.original_text: But the army officer did not believe
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 군 장교는 믿지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: what the owner of the ship said
